description:
Hello my fellow Design Thinker,

I created this template based on the excellent IDEO's Frame Your Design Challenge worksheet. 


Make sure you define the Problem Statement first.

And guess what? I also created a "Design Thinking / Problem Statement Template" that you can use based on the 5W+1H framework.
